question_stem: Which of the following is a discrete random variable?
question_stem_html: Which of the following is a discrete random variable?

choices.text: The amount of rainfall in a given day.
The number of coin tosses until we observe heads.
choices.explanation: Yes, this will be an integer count, so it is discrete. It could be a very very large number though!

choices.text: The time taken for a car to travel between two cities.
choices.explanation: This is a variable that could be recorded with infinite precision. It is continuous.

choices.text: The height of a randomly chosen student.
